Articles.Content:
Hello fellow kerbal Space program players. I have just recently bought ksp in steam and I think the game is absolutely awesome. anyway, I was just wondering if you all could help me get an orbit and get to the mun and further ANNNNND what should I get to help me with the game.

Thankyou squad and the forums for letting me get this game

Hey and welcome to the game and forums  

A great way to start and learn KSP is by watching Scott Manleys video's. 

For all your questions you can search on the forums or make your own thread in the one of the question/support forums.

Edited October 25, 2016 by DrLicor
Here are a couple of guides I made for new players, Archibald1936. Orbit and moons. They probably need a little updating, but I hope they're still helpful.

Hello Archibald1936 and welcome to the forum!

There is lots of help here to assist you in climbing the learning curve that is KSP.

Happy landings!

Welcome to the Forums,  Archibald! If you need help with getting to the Mun, then, as mentioned, Scott Manley is a great help. Protip: the stock Kerbal X ship can't get you to the Mun and back without several modifications. It's better to base your designs off of Scott's tutorials. Don't forget a heat shield and parachutes!
thankyou all for your help, safe landings guys
